column1: Published Course Length (in days, including weekends and holidays)

* Technical Competency: Students are required to meet and maintain technical competency standards.
* Career Services: Students are required to complete all career services assigned modules including; resume and online profile, conducting mock interviews and phone screens with Galvanize staff.
* Delivery of Capstone Project approved by Lead Instructor.
